attributes.action: put the price of fuel back under a pound a litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my petitions is to try get the price of fuel back down to under a litre, the reason for this is the government are complaining that theres to many people claiming benefit, may be because it costs more now to go to work than it does to claim benefits, maybe its time for the goverment to listen to its voters instead of us talking upon deaf ears. so come on votes lets get our voice heard and get this country back on its feet and moving again, down with the the fuel prices

rejection.details: The Government does not set fuel prices - pricing is a matter for fuel suppliers
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
